info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:18PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Abbeville and southern Greenwood Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 518 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Abbeville, or 6 miles north of Troy, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenwood, Ninety Six, Ninety Six Historic Site, Greenwood State Park, Promised Land, Bradley, Kirksey, Dyson, Callison and Epworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
